item.title: Retrieve Large Dataset in Elasticsearch
item.description: It’s easy to get small dataset from Elasticsearch by using size and from. However, it’s impossible to retrieve large dataset in the same way. Deep Paging Problem #As we know it, Elasticsearch data is organised into indexes, which is a logical namespace, and the real data is stored into physical shards.
